thread.title: San Francisco cops seek word on stolen ‘Our Silences’ sculptures
thread.title_full: San Francisco cops seek word on stolen ‘Our Silences’ sculptures - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Kale Williams
title: San Francisco cops seek word on stolen ‘Our Silences’ sculptures
text:
Photo: Courtesy, San Francisco Police Department A solid bronze sculpture, identical to the one pictured here, was stolen from a public art exhibit in front of San Francisco's Ferry Building sometime before Sept. 4, 2015. A solid bronze sculpture, identical to the one pictured here, was...
San Francisco police are asking the public to speak up if they spot three bronze sculptures that went missing last month from the “Our Silences” public art installation in Harry Bridges Plaza near the Ferry Building. A solid bronze sculpture, identical to the one pictured here, was stolen from a public art exhibit in front of San Francisco's Ferry Building sometime before Sept. 4, 2015. San Francisco police are asking the public to speak up if they spot three bronze sculptures that went missing last month from the “Our Silences” public art installation in Harry Bridges Plaza near the Ferry Building.
